backend/main.mo: Defines the main Motoko canister with storage mixins, authorization, Stripe config, ERP data types, and persistent state maps for users, classes, attendance, grades, fees, announcements, and library items.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for various frontend files including layouts, pages, components, and 3D features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theming variables for light and dark modes and applying global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file that loads the main React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the main TanStack Router structure with public and ERP routes, layouts, and global providers.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for first‑time users to enter and save profile details using a mutation hook.

frontend/src/components/layout/ErpLayout: Defines the ERP dashboard layout with role‑filtered navigation, sidebar toggling, profile setup modal, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/PublicFoo: Renders the public site footer with links, contact info, and a dynamic attribution section.
frontend/src/components/layout/PublicLay: Wraps public pages with navigation, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/PublicNav: Implements the public navigation bar with responsive mobile menu, links, theme toggle, and ERP login button.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeProvi: Provides theme context with light/dark/system modes and syncs resolved theme to the DOM.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeToggl: Button component that switches between light and dark themes.
frontend/src/components/three/PanoramaVi: Displays a 360° panorama viewer using three.js with orbit controls.
frontend/src/components/three/SchoolHero: Renders a simple 3D school scene with camera controls for the homepage hero section.

frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an authentication context and React provider for managing Internet Identity login, logout, and stored identity retrieval.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode styles, accessibility focus styles, and print/reduced‑motion rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
